comment: Good luck. Prob the worse professor ive EVER had. He does not really care for your grade or if you fail. No extra credit is given and he does not give partial credit on exams even if your math is correct and you answer incorrectly. He tells you to go to his office hours, but when you do he reminds you how stupid you should feel.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: Dr. McGarey is a  to the point professor. His class is tough and not one that you can push aside. It is clear what he expects and he will try to help, but go to his OH's if you are confused or you will regret it. I withdrew from his lab unfortunately, but I would retake with him. He is willing to help but you MUST be willing to ask and accept it

Brilliant Professor, one of the most knowledgeable teachers I have ever had, and I am now a doctoral student at GRU. Not easy, but he really makes you learn the material. If you want to be an intelligent person with actual knowledge about microbiology you will benefit from this class. I am able to communicate with my immunologist friends now.

Brilliant person with boring teaching ability. His lectures can be boring if one is not self motivated. His interest is in research students. He goes in too deep in detail that the primary concept is forgotten - as where you started. His breakdown of subject is no better than the book; why do you need a teacher?? read, study the book.

He really knows his stuff! He is really interested and excited about his topics and he and gets very detailed. I took him for micro and immunology. Micro is interesting and the labs are fun, but he demonstrates everything and they take the whole time. The first half of immunology is interesting but it gets boring and very technical. Read your book!

Dull and dry class. His interest is only research student. Rest of the students are of no interest for him. His teaching is not in 100% sync with the book. In exams, he asks what he teaches. Moreover, he will never remind students about upcoming test, quiz etc. be on your toes.
Brilliant professor. His lectures are crystal clear, his labs are in-depth and extremely precise, and his tests are brutal. But you WILL learn microbiology. I could not recommend a better professor.

ABSOLUTELY no non-sense personality. Not friendly at all. However, willing to help if you approached. His pace and brilliancy is intimidating. If you are avg student, he is not for you. Study 24/7. yet his exam questions will confuse you.

I took this class over the summer and it was easier than I expected. McGarey is an awesome teacher and does a great job at teaching. There is a lot to know though. Study the powerpoints, know them like the back of your hand and know your notes and you will do fine on the tests. Go to his office and get him to help you with any questions you have.

I actually loved Dr. McGarey. I must say I was somewhat skeptical to take him because he had so many bad rate my prof reviews, as well as, verbal reviews.  I am soooo glad I took him.  He is by far the best instructor I've taken at KSU (he can teach!!) Yes, you need to come to class, read, and take notes. If you do these things you will do fine.

This class is designed for those who are serious about their major and future career. You must show up for class and take notes in order to pass. Read the book,study the ppt, and read the papers that are given. He was really helpful in the class and he was sure TOUGH. Overall, he is a great professor to have.

This class is designed for those who are serious about their major and future career. You must show up for class and take notes in order to pass. Read the book,study the ppt, and read the papers that are given. He was really helpful in the class and he was sure TOUGH. Overall, he is a great professor to have.

I'm finishing up his class.He is by far not the easiest teacher I've had. Expect the worst in tests. I didn't and failed miserably in the first test. The second earned me a B, but I had to work very hard for it. Read the book, know it like the back of your hand. Study his notes and TAKE them! Attendance isn't mandatory he most definitely GO!

Had him for Immunology and just took him for Virology and Diagnostics: Infectious Agents. While he is probably the toughest Professor I've ever had, he is definitely the best. I've learned more from him in one class than I have in two years. If you want to learn, and be good in lab, then take this professor. One thing: he is kind of intimidating.
Knowledgeable teacher. Great help in lab, although I thought we needed more lab time to fit everything in. Tests are straight forward, as long as you are present in class and study.

Immunology is an interesting class. Dr. M is a very good teacher.  You will learn a lot from him.  His teaching style is not monotonous so you will stay awake...well you better for test purposes.  If you want a class that you don't have to study for or read the book, this is NOT the class for you.  I really had to work for my A in this one.

I learned more in this class than any other I have taken before. McGarey really knows his stuff and makes it interesting. Tests were multiple choice. Just study his power points and GO TO CLASS!! Lots of quizzes though, freaked me out at first. You have to keep on top of this class and study PPTs before every class.
not necessarily an easy teacher, you do have to take your time and spend time on the subject, but he really knows his stuff especially when he is talking about research and studies and micro
I would have taken Dr. McGarey for every Bio or Btec class at KSU if I could...He takes alot of complicated info and makes it seem easy as the previous person wrote class+study=good grade
Cool Prof. Very clear picture painted of what he teaches powerpoints + book + go to class= learn alot get good grades
Extremely difficult professor. Knows what he is talking about and is very smart in his field of study. be prepared to work very hard in lab! Tests are impossible and the class was very difficult...
If you don't have enough stress in your life then this class is for you!!

Nice teacher, pretty easy, yes tests and quizzes are kind of hard, but u know exactly whats on the quizzes or test, just study a little. Would take him for every possible Bio class if possible, very helpful and really cared.

McGarey is an excellent professor.  He expects a lot, but is a very clear and consistent teacher.  He is willing to explain things over and over again, and helps in and out of the classroom.  He isn't an easy A, but learning from him was a blessing to my future coursework because he taught how to do things right the first time.

By far the Hardest teacher I have encountered at KSU. His exams are very hard.. He is not a people person and does not encourage his student's to suceed. He is unapprochable at times.. Would not recommend taking him at all. Extremly hard class!!!!
He is a no nonsense person. He does not drop a test grade or curves grades at all. Be prepared to study,study, and study some more.

Dr. McGarey is an extremely hard teacher. He expects a lot from his students and is extremely demanding. He is unapproachable at times and does not care who passes or who fails. He is very discouraging at times.  I would not recommend taking him.
No Comments
great class...great prof

Biology 2101 is a big waste of time.  I had to take as an upperclassmen (I was a transfer student) and I got marked off on really nit-picky things on lab reports that really hurt my grade.  In Virology, the class itself was alright, but there was this massive report and display project due at the end of the semester.  The report was alright, but making a display seemed a little too high school science fair.

He is a great instructor. Always willing to help his students and explains the subjects very well. He doesn't like a lazy student, which is the right thing of course. I will recommend him for any student.

Smart and interesting teacher.  Gives lots of busy work, but that means more opportunities for grades.  Expects a lot out of his students.  Don't take if you're a slacker or aren't interested in this class at all.

Dr.McGarey is great/ he expects you to take a lot from his class, and you will work for your grade. But put in the effort, he is a very fair grader, and makes this course interesting. Also, he knows if you are trying your hardest and he appreciates that.
great professor.  Makes class interesting.  Very helpful.  He always makes himself available for his students.  He is very good with names.  Loved him.
No Comments
He is a very hard grader. He will help you if you need it. He is very good at explaining things and he is very intelligent.
Incredibly smart, but demands a lot from his students.
No Comments
McGarey modifies the material according to the top interests of the class. Great communicator and knows his material! Expects honesty and responsibility.
